definition: to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: This distorts external perceptions of China's solvency.
sentences.chinese: 外界对中国偿付能力的错误认识。

sentences.english: The services by LPKF will be compensated according to the agreements as concluded.
sentences.chinese: 乐普科的服务将按照达成的价款予以偿付。

sentences.english: You ought to pay us the credit interest once payment is wrongly refused.
sentences.chinese: 若是拒付错了，你们该当偿付我方的银行利钱。

sentences.english: The sum of money given by the insurance company satisfied for his losses.
sentences.chinese: 这笔款是作为补偿他的损失由保险公司偿付的。

sentences.english: Can we say with certitude that Greece doesn't have enough money to pay its debts? Yes.
sentences.chinese: 我们能断言希腊没有足够的钱偿付债务吗？

sentences.english: The true rate of interest paid on an installment loan.
sentences.chinese: 对一笔分期偿付的贷款所支付的实际利率。

sentences.english: They decided to levy on his property to pay his debts.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定扣押他的财产以偿付他的债务。

sentences.english: The reimbursement authorization should not be subject to an expiry date.
sentences.chinese: 偿付授权书不应规定有效日期。

sentences.english: You ought to pay us the prohilittlek interest once payment is wrongly refused.
sentences.chinese: 万一拒付错了，你们该当偿付我方的银行利钱。

sentences.english: In reimbursement of these ext ra expenses , please draw on us.
sentences.chinese: 请开汇票向我方支款，用于偿付这些额外费用。

sentences.english: You ought to pay us the bank interest once payment is wrongly refused.
sentences.chinese: 假如拒付错了，你们应该偿付我方的银行利息。

sentences.english: Jack worked his passage to China.
sentences.chinese: 杰克靠干活偿付船费来到中国。

sentences.english: And hospitals won't be allowed to pass along the costs of uncompensated care to patients.
sentences.chinese: 医院将不被允许获得这方面给患者治疗的偿付。

sentences.english: The total value of the entire equipment will be reimbursed to you by installment in4 years.
sentences.chinese: 全部设备为部款项将采用四年期分期付款的办法偿付。

sentences.english: This documentary credit is subject to the uniform rules for bank-to-bank reimbursements under documentary credits.
sentences.chinese: 该信用证服从信用证下银行之间偿付的统一惯例。

sentences.english: In reimbursement of these extra expenses, please draw on us.
sentences.chinese: 请开汇票向我方支款，用于偿付这些额定费用。

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
